products.title: IH/Simmons Bilt C3 Style Jacket
products.description: One of our favourite jacket builds from Simmons Bilt. A 15mm sheepskin, aviator-style jacket, his Racing Spirit x Simmons Bilt collaboration jacket uses the highest quality materials and hardware and is built by one of the top sheepskin makers in the world.

products.title: 21oz Selvedge Denim Type III - Indigo
products.description: A classic returns! Our original Type III jacket, made from our signature 21oz indigo Japanese selvedge denim. No modifications, just true to the original with a shorter body length and no side pockets.

products.title: Built Reversible Bomber Jacket
products.description: Reversible bomber jacket in durable water-repellent nylon with a quilted lining. Relaxed fit featuring a sleeve pocket, exterior flap pockets and interior welt pockets. Embroidery at the lower front.

products.title: Racing Spirit x Simmons Bilt Flight Jacket
products.description: The Type ANJ-4 shearling sheepskin flying jacket was first introduced in 1943 and worn by the USAAF and the US Navy (replacing the Type-B-3). This Racing Spirit x Simmons Bilt collaboration jacket uses the highest quality materials and hardware, and is built by one of the top sheepskin artisans in the world. Whilst staying faithful to the original in appearance, for this iteration Haraki San has subtly tweaked the overall design to offer a greatly improved fit when compared to other reproductions.

products.title: 21oz Denim Rider's Jacket - Indigo
products.description: Our traditional rider's jacket, constructed from 21oz Japanese indigo denim. Designed for a streamlined fit to increase wind resistance - this cut features zippered cuffs, a snap fastening collar and a tack button secured hem, with action bi-swing shoulders for increased manoeuvrability.

products.title: 21oz Denim Rider's Jacket - Superblack Non-Fade
products.description: Our traditional rider's jacket, constructed from 21oz 'Superblack' non-fade Japanese denim. Designed for a streamlined fit to increase wind resistance - this cut features zippered cuffs, a snap fastening collar and a tack button secured hem, with action bi-swing shoulders for increased manoeuvrability.

products.title: Split Steer Modified Type III Jacket - Brown
products.description: Modified Type III Jacket, made from soft split steer hide rough-out leather by FourSpeed, Japan, to Haraki's design. Modified with a slightly longer body than the original Levi's version, and with the addition of two external hand-warmer pockets, two internal snap fastened "gun" pockets and a cotton twill lining.

products.title: Japanese Horsehide Double Motorcycle Jacket - Black
products.description: Constructed from premium vegetable tanned horsehide, the leather used to create this Racing Spirit original design jacket is sourced from Himeji, the tanning capital of Japan. Pigment dyed black - meaning that once the pigment fades out, the natural leather will begin to show underneath - the contemporary design utilises a double-breasted, asymmetrical YKK zipper opening to increase wind-resistance. Other features include a snapped stand up collar, zippered pockets and cuffs and a colour-matched black polyester lining - all adding up to create the perfect blend of functionality, durability and modern style.

products.title: Japanese Horsehide Flight Jacket
products.description: This biker jacket was made in Japan from medium weight leather and features hand finished details for a vintage inspired look.

products.title: Flannel Bomber Jacket
products.description: This midweight piece is made in Italy in a loose fitting silhouette inspired by vintage bomber jackets. Its wool blend fabric has been exclusively developed at an Italian mill that also produces exclusive Racing Spirit haberdashery fabrics.

products.title: Locklear leather biker jacket
products.description: This biker jacket was made in Italy from medium weight leather and features hand finished details for a vintage inspired look.

products.title: Leather Biker Jacket
products.description: Garment made with full-grain cowhide leather with a light and flexible texture. Chocolate brown tone with a khaki undertone. Yarn-dyed check twill lining on body. Specially designed for a vintage look.

products.title: Aged Suede Jacket
products.description: It has been made with aged suede. Adjustable buckle loops on the sides. Metal buttons made in the United States. Lining on the yoke, sleeves and waist.

products.title: Slim Fit Leather Biker Jacket
products.description: Inspired by late 1940s motorcycle jackets. Made of leather treated with a black on brown vegetable dye. The distressed finish is achieved through a multi-step process that allows the garment to wear over time. Padded elbow and shoulder pads. Cafe racer style mandarin collar. Full twill lining.
